 PREV CLASS  NEXT CLASS          FRAMES    NO FRAMES DETAIL:   CONSTRUCTORS |  METHODS |  FIELDS

Class tripleplay.ui.Field

Added Methods
boolean hasFocus() Returns true if this Field is backed by a native field and that field currently has keyboard (virtual or physical) focus.
Field updateNativeFieldBounds() Forcibly notify the NativeTextField backing this field that its screen position has changed.
 

Added Fields
Flag MULTILINE Sets the field to allow the return key to insert a line break in the text.
Style<String> RETURN_KEY_LABEL Sets the label used on the "return" key of the virtual keyboard on native keyboards.
 

Changed Fields
Flag AUTOCAPITALIZATION Change in type from Style<Boolean> to Flag.
 Controls the behavior of native text fields with respect to auto-capitalization on platforms that support it.
Flag AUTOCORRECTION Change in type from Style<Boolean> to Flag.
 Controls the behavior of native text fields with respect to auto-correction on platforms that support it.
Flag FULLTIME_NATIVE_FIELD Change in type from Style<Boolean> to Flag.
 If on a platform that utilizes native fields and this is true, the native field is displayed whenever this Field is visible, and the native field is responsible for all text rendering.
Flag SECURE_TEXT_ENTRY Change in type from Style<Boolean> to Flag.
 Controls secure text entry on native text fields: typically this will mean dots or asterix displayed instead of the typed character.
